title: Creamy Chicken and Sun-Dried Tomato Pasta

ingredients.content: 2 sprigs fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves only (approx. 20 leaves)
2 sprigs fresh basil, leaves only, plus extra to garnish (approx. 10 lg. leaves)
¼ - ½ fresh chili, seeds removed if preferred, plus extra to serve, (e.g. serrano)
3 ½ oz sun-dried tomatoes, in oil, lightly drained
16 oz chicken breast fillets, skinless, in pieces (½ - ¾ in.)

preparations.content: Place onion, garlic, parsley, basil, fresh chili, sun-dried tomatoes and butter into mixing bowl and chop <b>8 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook <b>3 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Add chicken, cream, water, wine and stock paste and cook <b>10 min/212°F//speed <b>.
Add pasta and cook <b>7-10 min/212°F//speed <b>, or until pasta is al dente and chicken is cooked through.
Garnish pasta with extra basil before serving.
